Reviews.Title: “Great hotel located minutes from airport.”

Reviews.Content: little motel located marina 5 min airport loma seafood restaurant hotel pizza nova restaurant short walk hotel marina excellent wood fired pizza outstanding salads beer free wifi password nicly remodeled bathrooms

Reviews.Content: average bathroom door window paint tidy bathroom nice bed comfortable microwave fridge size ok table internet breakfast sweet buns muffins cereal coffee fruit juice price close walk restaurants marina nice laundry site walked 2 short blocks launderette wasnt bad booked online rate

Reviews.Content: stayed night quick business trip beds comfortable bathroom looked recently remodeled harbor ironing board iron fine front desk staff super friendly muffins fruit breakfast lobby nice surprise stay

Reviews.Title: “Not bad...you get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: PereAhmed
Reviews.Content: constant reviews tripadvisor reviewers forget paying pot roast expecting prime rib vagabond inn loma falls pot roast category expecting stayed couple nights september found entirely adequate paying heres 1 clean renovated bathroom bit didnt bathroom parties planned wasnt disappointment 2 smallish view parking lot bed comfortable sort stuff didnt expect playing touch football 3 hardworking functional refrigerator 4 television probably didnt matter 5 decent location close plenty coffee shops convenience stores restauraunts easy walking distance 6 pleasant desk attendant 7 free breakfast expect fruit pastries coffee juice 8 free parking 9 pool didnt clean handy weather hotter missed heat wave week downsides bet smelled damp clammy arrived improved ac circulation decor somewhat dated shabby clean neat smallish suitcases plus peripheral stuff spread ourselves european hotel hotel wedged busy fish market street pool streetside people using enjoying pool fence pool deck street offers security privacy noisy wasnt stayed dont vagabond inn looking highend hotel experience wont looking offers basic accommodation reasonable price vagabond fits bill ill pot roast please

Reviews.Title: “Pokey hole”
Reviews.Author: Ranchito1
Reviews.Content: hotel despite renovation bathrooms cheap job unfriendly staff dirty armchair animal hair cushion pulled cleaner vacuum nope breakfast joke danish cheap muffins pool attractive worth lower sd price neighborhood attractive ans eerily deserted night check cabrillo national monument 3 miles nice views rocks base loma watch waves impossible swept

Reviews.Title: “A bargain in San Diego”
Reviews.Author: KansasTraveler601
Reviews.Content: ten night stay vagabond inn loma comfortably furnished newly remodeled bathrooms location noise traffic city youre five minutes bonus city pool warm included shallow deep adult swimming kid playing desk staff accommodating cleaning staff fine job cleaning beach sand managed track bargain favorite expensive city

Reviews.Title: “Good small hotel - Great Location”
Reviews.Author: catfish2
Reviews.Content: 3 weeks fancy clean looked hotels neighborhood liked beds comfortable linens condition continental breakfast lobby chocolate croissant pastries fruit juice coffee staff friendly helpful price reasonable found location short walk excellent restaurants close downtown neighborhood feeling daily services walking distance 5 blocks

Reviews.Title: “Wish I'd stayed somewhere else”
Reviews.Author: alldon
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights booked ater staying vagabond inn palm springs unfortunately standard overhang dark included breakfast minimal served tiny reception pool wa faced road receptionist polite tried information local restaurants corkscrew motel loma marina downtown san diego close airport night flying

Reviews.Content: safe crash exploring bathroom acceptably clean ordinary definitely hotel cracks bathroom caulking etcbut horrible linens decent condition fair amount traffic noise hotels hear upstairs hall front desk staff low key super friendly helpful customer service fancier restaurant valentines day 24 hour coffee breakfast 15 minutes central san diego sushi nearby youre looking affordable crash opposed luxurious definitely value
